trans-unit.source:
\n

Defines members that data entity classes can implement to provide custom synchronous and asynchronous validation support.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value that indicates whether the entity has validation errors.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: true if the entity currently has validation errors; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Occurs when the validation errors have changed for a property or for the entire entity.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx x xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the validation errors for a specified property or for the entire entity.
